title: Buckhead New Jersey - Buckhead | Newport Meat & Seafood
text: Buckhead New Jersey About Us Buckhead New Jersey, formerly Trinity Seafood was formed in 2001 from a desire to provide top quality seafood to local restaurants with a focus on locally sourced products from New Jersey and surrounding areas. Growing at a rapid rate it was eventually taken over by Sysco Foods and combined with their specialty meat and seafood program. Today, as Buckhead New Jersey, we still source locally as much as possible and source internationally for the best and freshest seafood available. With deliveries reaching from Maryland to Boston including NYC and Philadelphia, Buckhead New Jersey is supplying millions of pounds to seafood lovers in some of the finest restaurants. Facility - 27,745 ft2 building - USDA inspected - SQF certified - Food Safety and Food Quality certified Offering
